00030 #include "run.h"

00032 Run::Run(QString prefix_name, QWidget * parent, Qt::WFlags f) : QDialog(parent, f)
00033 {
00034     setupUi(this);
00035 
00036 
00037     this->prefix_name = prefix_name;
00038     // Loading libq4wine-core.so
00039     libq4wine.setFileName("libq4wine-core");
00040 
00041     if (!libq4wine.load()){
00042         libq4wine.load();
00043     }
00044 
00045     // Getting corelib calss pointer
00046     CoreLibClassPointer = (CoreLibPrototype *) libq4wine.resolve("createCoreLib");
00047     CoreLib = (corelib *)CoreLibClassPointer(true);
00048 
00049     // Creating database classes
00050     db_prefix = new Prefix();
00051 
00052     loadThemeIcons(CoreLib->getSetting("app", "theme", false).toString());
00053 
00054     connect(cmdCancel, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(cmdCancel_Click()));
00055     connect(cmdOk, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(cmdOk_Click()));
00056     connect(cmdGetProgramBin, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(cmdGetProgram_Click()));
00057     connect(cmdGetWorkDir, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(cmdGetWorkDir_Click()));
00058     connect(cmdAdd, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(cmdAdd_Click()));
00059 
00060     connect(comboPrefixes, SIGNAL(currentIndexChanged (int)), this, SLOT(comboPrefixes_indexChanged (int)));
00061     connect(cbUseConsole, SIGNAL(stateChanged(int)), this, SLOT(cbUseConsole_stateChanged(int)));
00062 
00063     connect(twbGeneral, SIGNAL(currentChanged(int)), this, SLOT(ResizeContent(int)));
00064 
00065     cmdGetProgramBin->installEventFilter(this);
00066     cmdGetWorkDir->installEventFilter(this);
00067 
00068     getPrefixes();
00069 
00070     return;
00071 }

00075 void Run::loadThemeIcons(QString themePath){
00076     QPixmap pixmap;
00077 
00078     if (!pixmap.load(tr("%1/data/exec.png").arg(themePath))){
00079         pixmap.load(":data/exec.png");
00080     }
00081 
00082     lblLogo->setPixmap(pixmap);
00083 
00084     cmdGetProgramBin->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00085     cmdGetWorkDir->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00086 
00087     return;
00088 }

00090 
00091 QIcon Run::loadIcon(QString iconName, QString themePath){
00092     // Function tryes to load icon image from theme dir
00093     // If it fails -> load default from rsource file
00094 
00095     QIcon icon;
00096 
00097     if ((!themePath.isEmpty()) and (themePath!="Default")){
00098         icon.addFile(tr("%1/%2").arg(themePath).arg(iconName));
00099         if (icon.isNull()){
00100             icon.addFile(tr(":/%1").arg(iconName));
00101         }
00102     } else {
00103         icon.addFile(tr(":/%1").arg(iconName));
00104     }
00105 
00106     return icon;
00107 }

00111     reject();
00112     return;

00115 void Run::cmdAdd_Click(){
00116     if (!cboxDlls->currentText().isEmpty()){
00117         twDlls->insertRow (0);
00118         QTableWidgetItem *newItem = new QTableWidgetItem(cboxDlls->currentText());
00119         twDlls->setItem(0, 0, newItem);
00120         newItem->setFlags( Qt::ItemIsEnabled | Qt::ItemIsSelectable );
00121         newItem = new QTableWidgetItem(cboxOveride->currentText());
00122         twDlls->setItem(0, 1, newItem);
00123         newItem->setFlags( Qt::ItemIsEnabled | Qt::ItemIsSelectable );
00124     }
00125 
00126     twDlls->resizeRowsToContents();
00127     twDlls->resizeColumnsToContents();
00128     twDlls->horizontalHeader()->setStretchLastSection(TRUE);
00129     return;
00130 }

00132 void Run::cmdOk_Click(){
00133 
00134     QString override;
00135     for (int i=1; i<=twDlls->rowCount(); i++){
00136         override.append(tr("%1=").arg(twDlls->item(i-1, 0)->text()));
00137         if (twDlls->item(i-1, 1)->text()==tr("Native"))
00138             override.append("n;");
00139         if (twDlls->item(i-1, 1)->text()==tr("Buildin"))
00140             override.append("b;");
00141         if (twDlls->item(i-1, 1)->text()==tr("Native, Buildin"))
00142             override.append("n,b;");
00143         if (twDlls->item(i-1, 1)->text()==tr("Buildin, Native"))
00144             override.append("b,n;");
00145     }
00146 
00147 
00148     execObj.execcmd = txtProgramBin->text();
00149 
00150     QSqlQuery query;
00151     //FIXME: Remove it please.
00152     query.prepare("SELECT id FROM prefix WHERE name=:name");
00153     query.bindValue(":name", comboPrefixes->currentText());
00154     query.exec();
00155     query.first();
00156 
00157     execObj.prefixid = query.value(0).toString();
00158 
00159     query.clear();
00160 
00161 
00162     if (cbUseConsole->checkState()==Qt::Checked){
00163         execObj.useconsole = "1";
00164     } else {
00165         execObj.useconsole = "0";
00166     }
00167     execObj.cmdargs = txtCmdArgs->text();
00168     execObj.override = override;
00169     execObj.winedebug = txtWinedebug->text();
00170     execObj.display = txtDisplay->text();
00171     execObj.wrkdir = txtWorkDir->text();
00172     execObj.nice = txtNice->text();
00173     execObj.desktop = txtDesktopSize->text();
00174 
00175     accept();
00176     return;
00177 }
00178 
00179 bool Run::eventFilter( QObject *object, QEvent *event )
00180 {
00181    //  firstly, check whether the object is the QTableWidget and if it's a mouse press event
00182     if (object == twDlls)
00183         if (event->type() == QEvent::KeyPress)
00184     {   // if yes, we need to cast the event
00185         QKeyEvent *keyEvent = static_cast<QKeyEvent*>(event);
00186         if (keyEvent->key()==Qt::Key_Delete)
00187             twDlls->removeRow(twDlls->currentRow());
00188 
00189         return true;
00190     }
00191 
00192     return QWidget::eventFilter(object, event);
00193 }
00194 
00195 void Run::getWineDlls(QString winedll_path){
00196     /*
00197      * This function Builds Wine dll list for selected prefix
00198      */
00199 
00200     cboxDlls->clear();
00201 
00202     if (winedll_path.isEmpty()){
00203         QSettings settings(APP_SHORT_NAME, "default");
00204         settings.beginGroup("wine");
00205         winedll_path=settings.value("WineLibs").toString();
00206         settings.endGroup();
00207     }
00208 
00209     QDir dir(winedll_path);
00210     dir.setFilter(QDir::Files | QDir::Hidden | QDir::NoSymLinks);
00211 
00212     QFileInfoList list = dir.entryInfoList();
00213     for (int i = 0; i < list.size(); ++i) {
00214         QFileInfo fileInfo = list.at(i);
00215         if (fileInfo.fileName().indexOf(".dll.so")>=0){
00216             cboxDlls->addItem ( fileInfo.fileName().left(fileInfo.fileName().length()-3));
00217         }
00218     }
00219 
00220     cboxDlls->setMaxVisibleItems (10);
00221 
00222     return;
00223 }
00224 
00225 void Run::getPrefixes(){
00226     /*
00227      * Getting prefixes and set default
00228      */
00229 
00230 
00231     QList<QStringList> result = db_prefix->getFields();
00232     for (int i = 0; i < result.size(); ++i) {
00233         comboPrefixes->addItem(result.at(i).at(1));
00234         if (result.at(i).at(1)==this->prefix_name){
00235             comboPrefixes->setCurrentIndex ( comboPrefixes->findText(result.at(i).at(1)) );
00236             if (result.at(i).at(2).isEmpty()){
00237                 prefix_dir = QDir::homePath();
00238                 prefix_dir.append("/.wine/drive_c/");
00239             } else {
00240                 prefix_dir = result.at(i).at(2);
00241             }
00242             getWineDlls(result.at(i).at(3));
00243         }
00244     }
00245 
00246     return;
00247 }
00248 
00249 void Run::comboPrefixes_indexChanged (int){
00250     /*
00251      * If user select prefix -- rebuild wine dlls list
00252      */
00253     QStringList result = db_prefix->getFieldsByPrefixName(comboPrefixes->currentText());
00254 
00255     if (result.at(1).isEmpty()){
00256         prefix_dir = QDir::homePath();
00257         prefix_dir.append("/.wine/drive_c/");
00258     } else {
00259         prefix_dir = result.at(1);
00260     }
00261 
00262     getWineDlls(result.at(2));
00263 
00264     return;
00265 }

00271 void Run::cbUseConsole_stateChanged(int){
00272     switch(cbUseConsole->checkState()){
00273         case Qt::Checked:
00274             txtWinedebug->setEnabled(TRUE);
00275         break;
00276         default:
00277             txtWinedebug->setEnabled(FALSE);
00278         break;
00279     }
00280 
00281     return;
00282 }

00284 void Run::ResizeContent(int TabIndex){
00285     switch (TabIndex){
00286         case 1:
00287             twDlls->resizeRowsToContents();
00288             twDlls->resizeColumnsToContents();
00289             twDlls->horizontalHeader()->setStretchLastSection(TRUE);
00290         break;
00291     }
00292 
00293     return;
00294 }

00296 void Run::cmdGetProgram_Click(){
00297 
00298     QString fileName;
00299     QString searchPath=prefix_dir;
00300 
00301     if (!txtProgramBin->text().isEmpty()){
00302         if (!txtWorkDir->text().isEmpty()){
00303         searchPath=txtWorkDir->text();
00304         } else {
00305         searchPath=txtProgramBin->text().left(txtProgramBin->text().length() - txtProgramBin->text().split("/").last().length());;
00306         }
00307     }
00308 
00309     if ((!QDir(searchPath).exists()) or (searchPath.isEmpty())){
00310         if (QDir(prefix_dir).exists()){
00311            searchPath=prefix_dir;
00312         } else {
00313            searchPath=QDir::homePath();
00314         }
00315      }
00316 
00317     QList<QUrl> prefix_urls;
00318     // Adding side bar urls for FileOpen dialogs
00319     if (QDir(prefix_dir).exists())
00320        prefix_urls << QUrl::fromLocalFile(prefix_dir);
00321 
00322     if ((searchPath != prefix_dir) && (QDir(searchPath).exists()))
00323         prefix_urls << QUrl::fromLocalFile(searchPath);
00324 
00325     prefix_urls << QUrl::fromLocalFile(QDir::homePath());
00326     prefix_urls << QUrl::fromLocalFile(QDir::rootPath());
00327 
00328     QFileDialog dialog(this);
00329       dialog.setFilter(QDir::Dirs | QDir::Hidden | QDir::Files );
00330       dialog.setWindowTitle(tr("Open Exe file"));
00331       dialog.setDirectory(searchPath);
00332       dialog.setFileMode(QFileDialog::ExistingFile);
00333       dialog.setNameFilter(tr("Exe files (*.exe)"));
00334       dialog.setSidebarUrls(prefix_urls);
00335 
00336      if (dialog.exec())
00337         fileName = dialog.selectedFiles().first();
00338 
00339     if(!fileName.isEmpty()){
00340         QStringList list1 = fileName.split("/");
00341         txtProgramBin->setText(fileName);
00342 
00343         QString wrkDir;
00344         wrkDir = fileName.left(fileName.length() - list1.last().length());
00345         txtWorkDir->setText(wrkDir);
00346     }
00347 
00348     return;
00349 }
00350 
00351 void Run::cmdGetWorkDir_Click(){
00352     QString searchPath=prefix_dir;
00353     QString fileName;
00354 
00355     if ((!txtProgramBin->text().isEmpty()) and (QDir().exists(txtProgramBin->text()))){
00356         searchPath=txtProgramBin->text().left(txtProgramBin->text().length() - txtProgramBin->text().split("/").last().length());;
00357     }
00358 
00359     if (!QDir(searchPath).exists()){
00360         if (QDir(prefix_dir).exists()){
00361            searchPath=prefix_dir;
00362         } else {
00363            searchPath=QDir::homePath();
00364         }
00365      }
00366 
00367     QList<QUrl> prefix_urls;
00368     // Adding side bar urls for FileOpen dialogs
00369     if (QDir(prefix_dir).exists())
00370        prefix_urls << QUrl::fromLocalFile(prefix_dir);
00371 
00372     if ((searchPath != prefix_dir) && (QDir(searchPath).exists()))
00373         prefix_urls << QUrl::fromLocalFile(searchPath);
00374 
00375     prefix_urls << QUrl::fromLocalFile(QDir::homePath());
00376     prefix_urls << QUrl::fromLocalFile(QDir::rootPath());
00377 
00378     QFileDialog dialog(this);
00379       dialog.setFilter(QDir::Dirs | QDir::Hidden);
00380 
00381       dialog.setFileMode(QFileDialog::Directory);
00382       dialog.setWindowTitle(tr("Open Directory"));
00383       dialog.setDirectory(searchPath);
00384           // This option wirksonly it qt 4.5. In fact this not works correctly with QDir::Hidden,  so I comment it out for a some  time
00385           //dialog.setOption(QFileDialog::ShowDirsOnly, true);
00386 
00387       dialog.setSidebarUrls(prefix_urls);
00388      if (dialog.exec())
00389         fileName = dialog.selectedFiles().first();
00390 
00391     if(!fileName.isEmpty()){
00392         txtWorkDir->setText(fileName);
00393     }
00394     return;
00395 }
